text: Xinshimen a! Nimen dang fucong an la, dang fucong shizhe [mu sheng] he nimen [musilin] zhong de zhangquan zhe. Jiaru nimen wei yi jian shi er zhengzhi, name, nimen dang ba na jian shi chengbao an la he shizhe [mu sheng] panjue, jiaru nimen quexin an la he mori. Zhe shi zui hao de, zuizhong de panjue.
